00023 #ifndef THREADPP_IMPLEMENTATION_H
00024 #define THREADPP_IMPLEMENTATION_H
00025 
00026 #include "ThreadPrerequisites.h"
00027 
00028 namespace threadpp
00029 {
00031         class Thread
00032         {
00033                 private:
00034                         bool mJoinable;
00035 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00036                         pthread_t mThread;
00037 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00038                         HANDLE mThreadHandle;
00039                         DWORD mThreadId;
00040 #endif
00041                 public:
00043                         THREADPP_INLINE Thread (void *(*start_routine)(void *), void *arg=NULL) : mJoinable(true)
00044                         {
00045 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00046                                 pthread_create(&mThread, NULL, start_routine, arg);
00047 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00048                                 mThreadHandle = CreateThread (0, 0, (LPTHREAD_START_ROUTINE)start_routine, arg, 0, &mThreadId);
00049 #endif
00050                         }
00051                         THREADPP_INLINE ~Thread ()
00052                         {
00053                                 if (mJoinable)
00054                                 {
00055 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00056                                         pthread_detach(mThread);
00057 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00058                                         CloseHandle (mThreadHandle);
00059 #endif
00060                                 }
00061                         }
00063                         THREADPP_INLINE void join ()
00064                         {
00065                                 assert (mJoinable);
00066 #if THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00067                                 pthread_join (mThread, NULL);
00068 #elif THREADPP_PLATFORM == THREADPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00069                                 WaitForSingleObject (mThreadHandle, INFINITE);
00070                                 CloseHandle (mThreadHandle);
00071 #endif
00072                                 mJoinable = false;
00073                         }
00074         };
00076         class ThreadGroup
00077         {
00078                 private:
00079                         typedef std::vector<Thread*> ThreadVector;
00080                         ThreadVector mThreads;
00081 
00082                 public:
00084                         THREADPP_INLINE void createThread (void *(*start_routine)(void *), void *arg=NULL)
00085                         {
00086                                 Thread *thread = new Thread (start_routine, arg);
00087                                 mThreads.push_back (thread);
00088                         }
00090                         THREADPP_INLINE void join ()
00091                         {
00092                                 ThreadVector::iterator itEnd = mThreads.end ();
00093                                 for (ThreadVector::iterator it=mThreads.begin();it!=itEnd;++it)
00094                                 {
00095                                         (*it)->join ();
00096                                 }
00097                         }
00099                         THREADPP_INLINE void clear ()
00100                         {
00101                                 ThreadVector::iterator itEnd = mThreads.end ();
00102                                 for (ThreadVector::iterator it=mThreads.begin();it!=itEnd;++it)
00103                                 {
00104                                         delete *it;
00105                                 }
00106                                 mThreads.clear ();
00107                         }
00108                         THREADPP_INLINE ~ThreadGroup ()
00109                         {
00110                                 clear ();
00111                         }
00112         };
00113 };
00114 
00115 #endif
